phrases.original: Every invite that you send promotes a specific event (Bible Talk, Sunday Service, etc.).
phrases.translated: Every invite that you send promotes a specific event (Bible Talk, Sunday Service, etc.).

phrases.original: Let your friends be responsible for keeping the details of their events up-to-date, so you can focus on inviting people. This is a great option if your friend is an evangelist, a Bible Talk Leader, is in a different age group, or lives close to a distant area that you plan on visiting.
phrases.translated: Let your friends be responsible for keeping the details of their events up-to-date, so you can focus on inviting people. This is a great option if your friend is an evangelist, a Bible Talk Leader, is in a different age group, or lives close to a distant area that you plan on visiting.

phrases.original: Customize your events with your own personal writing style. Describe what personally resonates with you. Or lead the way by publishing your event, so that your friends can use it within their invites.
phrases.translated: Customize your events with your own personal writing style. Describe what personally resonates with you. Or lead the way by publishing your event, so that your friends can use it within their invites.
